section.p: Before uninstalling a Log Agent from an OpenStack node, it is recommended that you make a backup of the agent's configuration settings. They are stored in the /opt/monasca/monasca-log-agent/conf/agent.conf file.
does not offer integrated backup and recovery mechanisms. Use the standard file system mechanisms instead.
To uninstall a Log Agent, proceed as follows:

li.p: Log in to the OpenStack node on which the agent is installed.
Stop the monasca-log-agent service and delete all related files:
li.codeblock: sudo systemctl stop monasca-log-agent sudo systemctl disable monasca-log-agent sudo rm -f /etc/systemd/system/monasca-log-agent.service sudo systemctl daemon-reload sudo systemctl reset-failed monasca-log-agent
